author: venkat-prasadh
body:
The Management Module is missing when Powershell is installed in Mac High Sierra 10.13.4.

![screen shot 2018-04-16 at 4 45 44 pm](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35565629/38806189-0db2b8f2-4196-11e8-8258-590c25d033fe.png)


This module is available when PS is installed in Sierra 10.12.6

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: `get-module` only shows the modules that are loaded.  Use `get-module -listavailable` to see all available modules.  I'm running the same version of macOS and the Management module works fine.

title: Mac High Sierra: Microsoft.Powershell.MANAGEMENT module missing
